pl.sudokusolver.recognizerlib.data

Class MNISTReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.sudokusolver.recognizerlib.data.MNISTReader

  • public class MNISTReader
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for reading data form MNIST format.
    It was crated using MNIST website.
    You can also download data set from this website.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public static IData read(java.lang.String dataUrl,
                         java.lang.String labelUrl,
                         DataType type)
                  throws VersionMismatchException,
                         java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Read and parse data from MNIST file, then save it to SimpleRowData object.
        Parameters:
        dataUrl - absolute path for data file.
        labelUrl - absolute path for labels file.
        type - type of output data.
        You can use:
        • DataType.Simple
        • DataType.SimpleSVM
        • DataType.Complex
        Returns:
        data packed into IData (it is SimpleRowData).
        Throws:
        VersionMismatchException - if magic numbers from file didn't match.
        java.io.IOException - if couldn't open file.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if type of data isn't supported.

      • loadFileToByteBuffer

        private static java.nio.ByteBuffer loadFileToByteBuffer(java.lang.String infile)
                                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Parameters:
        infile - absolute path to file used to open.
        Returns:
        all bytes read from this file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if couldn't open file.

      • createLabel

        private static org.opencv.core.Mat createLabel(int size,
                                               DataType type)
        Parameters:
        size - size of labels matrix.
        type - data type used to store labels.
        Returns:
        matrix which contains only zeroes and have size of size x 1.

      • getStringFromLable

        private static java.lang.String getStringFromLable(int label)
        Parameters:
        label - value of label
        Returns:
        string which represent this value.

      • putLabel

        private static void putLabel(org.opencv.core.Mat labels,
                             int label,
                             int n,
                             DataType type)
        Parameters:
        labels - matrix whit all labels.
        label - value which we want to put to matrix.
        n - current label index.
        type - type of labels matrix.

      • putImg

        private static void putImg(org.opencv.core.Mat trainData,
                           org.opencv.core.Mat img,
                           int n)
        Parameters:
        trainData - matrix whit data.
        img - images which we want add to data.
        n - current data index.

      • loadImg

        private static org.opencv.core.Mat loadImg(java.nio.ByteBuffer source,
                                           int imgRows,
                                           int imgCols)
        Parameters:
        source - source of data
        imgRows - image rows
        imgCols - image cols
        Returns:
        matrix of size imgRows x imgCols which contains imgRows*imgCols bytes from source.
